attributes.action: Impose a trade ban to illegal Israeli settlements in Palestinian Territory
attributes.additional_details: This action will show that the UK is committed to finding a peaceful solution to the Israel-Palestine conflict which will require for Palestine to have full sovereignty over its Territory and show that the UK stands against terrorists on both sides, who wish to continue conflict.
attributes.background: Ban the sales of goods to and from illegal Israeli settlements in occupied Palestinian Territories including East Jerusalem, West Bank and Golan Heights.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585314
